publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4932 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team—That the Parliament warmly congratulates the West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team of Jamie O’Malley, Arran Smith and Craig Parlane who swept the board with gold, silver and bronze medals in the 200 metres and 500 metres kayaking events at the Special Olympics 2009 in Leicester; recognises all their hard work and effort, with training every week at Loch Lomond; commends their coaches for their dedication and inspiration to the team, and looks forward to the team’s success at the next Special Olympics.

S3M-4932 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team—That the Parliament warmly congratulates the West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team of Jamie O’Malley, Arran Smith and Craig Parlane who swept the board with gold, silver and bronze medals in the 200 metres and 500 metres kayaking events at the Special Olympics 2009 in Leicester; recognises all their hard work and effort, with training every week at Loch Lomond; commends their coaches for their dedication and inspiration to the team, and looks forward to the team’s success at the next Special Olympics.
S3M-4932 Congratulations to West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team (lodged on 24 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-4932 Congratulations to West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team (lodged on 24 September 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-4932 Congratulations to West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team (lodged on 24 September 2009) Karen Gillon*
S3M-4932 Congratulations to West Dunbartonshire Kayak Team (lodged on 24 September 2009) Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Helen Eadie*, Cathy Peattie*, Trish Godman*
